title: World War II
key_facts: Global conflict involving Axis and Allied powers
Began with Germany's invasion of Poland in 1939
Holocaust and atomic bombings marked unprecedented human impact
causes: Treaty of Versailles grievances and economic instability
Appeasement and failures of collective security
outcome: Unconditional surrender of Germany (May 1945) and Japan (September 1945).
Allied occupation of Germany and Japan.
impacts: Formation of the United Nations and new global order
Decolonization and Cold War geopolitical divisions
Technological advances; human rights frameworks strengthened
